meanings.definition: To deny any connection with or responsibility for
meanings.sent1: The company disclaims all liability for any damages caused by their product.
meanings.sent2: He disclaims any involvement in the prank played on his friend.
meanings.sent3: The cat disclaims ownership of the knocked-over vase, but the guilty look gives it away.
meanings.sent4: The politician disclaims any association with the scandal, but the evidence speaks otherwise.
meanings.sent5: The sign clearly disclaims any responsibility for lost items left unattended.

meanings.definition: To renounce or repudiate any claim to or connection with
meanings.sent1: She disclaims her inheritance in favor of charity.
meanings.sent2: The author disclaims any intention to plagiarize the famous novel.
meanings.sent3: The student disclaims credit for the group project, claiming it was a team effort.
meanings.sent4: The athlete disclaims his previous record, aiming to break it in the upcoming competition.
meanings.sent5: The artist disclaims any association with the controversial art piece, despite rumors suggesting otherwise.
